actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide individuals a credit against income tax for up to $800 of the cost of purchasing a new domestically produced automobile.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an individual taxpayer an income tax credit for the purchase of a new domestically manufactured automobile which is acquired primarily for personal use and which has a specified fuel economy standard. Limits such credit to the lesser of ten percent of the cost of the automobile or $800.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide individuals a credit against income tax for up to $800 of the cost of purchasing a new domestically produced automobile.
